attributes.action: Provide additional money to healthcare workers during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Healthcare professionals are underpaid and underappreciated.
attributes.background: Provide healthcare companies/organisations with more money to pay workers who are risking their own health (and the health of their families), or alternatively offer tax benefits to individuals working in healthcare industry.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
